SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM +1 as ROWNUM, c.* FROM ( SELECT a.*, count(fileNum) AS fileCount FROM article a LEFT JOIN attachmentfile as f ON a.articleNum = f.articleNum LEFT JOIN article_comment as c ON a.articleNum = c.article_num WHERE a.articleStatus = 'Y'
AND a.boardNum = #{boardnum}
AND (a.articleSubject LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') OR a.articleTextContent LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') OR f.originalFileName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%'))
AND ( a.articleSubject LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') OR a.articleTextContent LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%'))
AND a.articleSubject LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')
AND a.articleTextContent LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')
AND f.originalFileName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')
OR c.comment_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')
AND a.articleWriter LIKE CONCAT('%', #{writer}, '%')
AND Date(a.articleDate) >= #{startDate} AND Date(a.articleDate) <= #{endDate}
GROUP BY a.articleNum
HAVING fileCount > 0
ORDER BY a.articleNum desc ) c, ( SELECT @ROWNUM := 0 ) R
